Class LeaderboardController

  • java.lang.Object
    • LeaderboardController

  • public class LeaderboardController
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    SHUBHAM _THAKRAL, TANMAY BANSAL This class is the controller class of Leaderboard.fxml. It is used to set the name, score and date of the top 10 players.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      javafx.scene.image.ImageView exitGame 
      javafx.scene.image.ImageView goBack
      goBack is the fx:id of the back button, which when clicked will take the user back to main page.

    • Field Detail

      • goBack

        public javafx.scene.image.ImageView goBack
        goBack is the fx:id of the back button, which when clicked will take the user back to main page. exitGame is the fx:id of the exit button, which when clicked will exit the game. name[i] is the fx:id of the ith name text field which stores the name of the ith player. score[i] is the fx:id of the ith score text field which stores the score of the ith player. date[i] is the fx:id of the ith date text field, which stores the date on which high score was created.

        public javafx.scene.image.ImageView exitGame

      • displayMainPage

        public void displayMainPage(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        This function displays the main page when goBack button is clicked.
        Parameters:
        e - is the MouseEvent which stores the state of the mouse.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - It throws Exception if the stage creation fails.

      • exit

        public void exit(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
          throws java.lang.Exception
        This function will exit the game when the exit button is clicked.
        Parameters:
        e - is the MouseEvent which stores the state of the mouse.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - It throws Exception if the stage creation fails.

      • updateLeaderboard

        public void updateLeaderboard(java.lang.String name,
                              java.lang.String score,
                              java.lang.String date,
                              int rank)
        This function is used to update the leader board with a new high score.
        Parameters:
        name - is the Name of the player who created the high score.
        score - is the final score of the player.
        date - is the date on which the player created the high score.
        rank - is the rank of player.
